member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.LogEntryMessage
member.summary: Represents a log message contract. Contains the common properties that are required for all log messages.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.LogEntryMessage.Message
member.summary: Message body to log.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.LogEntryMessage.Categories
member.summary: Category name used to route the log entry to a one or more trace listeners.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.LogEntryMessage.Priority
member.summary: Importance of the log message. Only messages whose priority is between the minimum and maximum priorities (inclusive) will be processed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.LogEntryMessage.EventId
member.summary: Event number or identifier.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.LogEntryMessage.Severity
member.summary: Log entry severity as a enumeration. (Unspecified, Information, Warning or Error).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.LogEntryMessage.Title
member.summary: Additional description of the log entry message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.LogEntryMessage.TimeStamp
member.summary: Date and time of the log entry message. This timestamp must use the format.

member.summary: The in which the program is running

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.LogEntryMessage.ManagedThreadName
member.summary: The name of the .NET thread.

member.summary: Related activity id

member.summary: The Win32 process ID for the current running process.

member.summary: The name of the current running process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.Properties.Resources.CannotDeserializeExtendedProperties
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot deserialize ExtendedProperties property from incoming message. The ExtendedPropertiesKeys and ExtendedPropertiesValues property values must be collections of the same length..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.Service.Properties.Resources.CannotDeserializeTimeStamp
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot deserialize TimeStamp property from incoming message. The timestamp is required and must use the DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind format..
